recipe_name: Spanish stew with chorizo and black olives
author: Ross Burden
method: In a saucepan, sweat the chorizo with the garlic and olive oil for four minutes. Add the tomatoes, black olives, butterbeans and red wine. Cook for ten minutes. Serve.
ingredients: 100g/3Â½oz chorizo, sliced,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tin cherry tomatoes,  50g/2oz small pitted black olives,  25g/1oz butterbeans,  5 tbsp red wine
